game.name: YUME ROOF
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In between the busyness of everyday life, a rooftop where nothing happens. YUME ROOF is a cozy sandbox game set on a Japanese rooftop, with no enemies or time limits. Customize the space from morning to night, and enjoy simply being there at your own pace.
